hero.title: Daily Tasks
hero.subtitle: Complete tasks to earn points and qualify for airdrops

walletWarning.title: Complete Your Information
walletWarning.description: You must add and verify your BEP-20 wallet address before you can complete tasks. This is required to receive your airdrop rewards.

verificationWarning.title: Account Verification Required
verificationWarning.description: To complete tasks, you must verify your wallet, Twitter, and Telegram accounts. This ensures fair distribution of rewards.

taskCard.walletRequiredTooltip: Complete your information to finish tasks

timerDescription: Complete the task and click below, or wait for auto-completion
manualReviewMessage: Your task is being manually reviewed by our team. Points will be awarded after approval.
autoApprovalMessage: Points will be automatically awarded around {time}
verificationMessage: Points will be awarded after verification period.
rejectionMessage: This task completion was rejected during review. No points were awarded.
taskFailedMessage: You closed the window before completing the task. Please try again and keep the window open.
doNotCloseWindow: Do not close the task window until the timer completes!

completion.growthMessage: Like a seed growing into a mighty tree, your progress flourishes!

taskList.noTasks: No tasks available at the moment. Check back later!
taskList.walletRequiredAlert: You must complete your information before finishing tasks. Please go to the Profile page.
taskList.verificationRequiredAlert: You must verify your wallet, Twitter, and Telegram accounts before completing tasks. Please complete your profile verification.

templates.twitterFollowDesc: Follow our official Twitter account @SylvanToken to stay updated with the latest news and announcements.
templates.twitterLikeDesc: Show your support by liking our official launch announcement tweet.
templates.twitterRetweetDesc: Help spread the word by retweeting our airdrop announcement to your followers.
templates.telegramJoinDesc: Join our official Telegram community to connect with other members and get real-time updates.
templates.websiteVisitDesc: Explore the Sylvan Token website to learn more about our project and vision.
templates.whitepaperReadDesc: Read our comprehensive whitepaper to understand the technology and tokenomics behind Sylvan Token.
templates.discordJoinDesc: Join our Discord community to chat with team members and other supporters in real-time.
templates.youtubeSubscribeDesc: Subscribe to our YouTube channel for video updates, tutorials, and project announcements.
templates.mediumFollowDesc: Follow our Medium blog to read in-depth articles about our project and the crypto ecosystem.
templates.githubStarDesc: Show your support by starring our GitHub repository and explore our open-source code.

taskExpiredMessage: This task deadline has passed and can no longer be completed.
noPendingTasksMessage: You've completed all available tasks! Check back later for new opportunities.
noCompletedTasksMessage: Complete tasks to see them here and track your progress.

organized.noActiveTasks: No active tasks available. Check back later for new opportunities!
organized.noCompletedTasks: No completed tasks yet. Start completing tasks to see them here!
organized.noMissedTasks: Great job! You haven't missed any tasks.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

referral.title: Refer a Friend
referral.step1: Share your unique referral code with friends
referral.step3: You earn points when they complete registration
referral.waitingForRegistration: Share your code and wait for a friend to register to complete this task
